1 // $Id: FieldManager.js 168 2008-08-21 08:32:46Z bobbicat71 $
  2 
  3 Ext.namespace('Ext.ux.netbox.core');
  4 
  5 /** Creates a new FieldManager class in the Netbox Filter Framework, eventually instantiating the fields.<br>
  6   * <b> NB: </b> If availableValues is specified and the type of the field is string the STRING_LIST and STRING_NOT_IN_LIST operators will be added to the fields.
  7   * @constructor
  8   * @param {Array of field config} config An array of configuration object for the fields in this object. Optional, if not present an empty FieldManager is created.
  9   * @config {String} id The id of the field (for example the id of the column)
 10   * @config {String} label The label of the field (for example the header of the column)
 11   * @config {Array} defaultValues The default values of the field in the format {value: ... , label: ...} Optional
 12   * @config {String} type The type of the field. Available values are: string, enum, float, int, date. Default type is string
 13   * @config {String} format Only for dates, the format of the date. Look Ext.ux.netbox.data.DateFilterType for more details
 14   * @config {Ext.data.Store} availableValues The store containing the available values for this field. Look at Ext.ux.netbox.core.Field.setAvailableValues for more details
 15   * @config {boolean} remoteStore True if the store is remote, false otherwise. Look at Ext.ux.netbox.core.Field.setStoreRemote for more details
 16   * @config {boolean} forceReload True if you want reload the store everytime expand the combo. Look at Ext.ux.netbox.core.Field.setForceReload for more details
 17   * @config {boolean} caseSensitive True if the value should be compared with the store's one with case sensitive. Look at Ext.ux.netbox.core.Field.setCaseSensitive for more details
 18   * @config {function} validate The function used to validate the values of the Field. Look at Ext.ux.netbox.core.Field.setValidateFn for more details
 19   * @class This class manages the filter fields. You should use an instance of this class (obtained using filterModel.getFieldManager) to add or remove filter fields, or to obtain them to add or remove operators.
 20   * More than one filter model can have the same FieldManager, allowing to have different sets of filters, but on the same set of fields.
 21   */
 22 Ext.ux.netbox.core.FieldManager=function(config){
 23   Ext.ux.netbox.core.FieldManager.superclass.constructor.call(this);
 24   this.addEvents(/** @scope Ext.ux.netbox.core.FieldManager.prototype */{
 25     /** Fires when a Field is added
 26       * @event fieldAdded
 27       * @param {Ext.ux.netbox.core.Field} field The added field
 28       */
 29     fieldAdded : true,
 30     /** Fires when a Field is removed
 31       * @event fieldRemoved
 32       * @param {Ext.ux.netbox.core.Field} field The removed field
 33       */
 34     fieldRemoved : true,
 35     /** Fires before a Field is removed
 36       * @event beforeFieldRemoved
 37       * @param {Ext.ux.netbox.core.Field} field The field to remove. To block the event removing just returns false
 38       */
 39     beforeFieldRemoved : true 
 40   });
 41   /**
 42     * @property {Ext.util.MixedCollection} fields The list of all fields for this FieldManager
 43     * @private
 44     */
 45   this.fields=new Ext.util.MixedCollection(false,function(field){return(field.getId())});
 46   if(config!==undefined){
 47     for(var i=0; i< config.length; i++){
 48       this.addField(config[i]);
 49     }
 50   }
 51 }
 52 
 53 Ext.extend(Ext.ux.netbox.core.FieldManager,Ext.util.Observable,/** @scope Ext.ux.netbox.core.FieldManager.prototype */
 54 {
 55 
 56   /** This method returns the list of all fields.
 57     * @return {Array of Ext.ux.netbox.core.Field} The collection of fields for this Filter
 58     */
 59   getAllFields : function(){
 60     return(this.fields.getRange());
 61   },
 62   /** This method returns a field by Id or null if it is not found.
 63     * @param {String} id The id of field
 64     * @return {Ext.ux.netbox.core.Field} The field with the given id
 65     */
 66   getFieldById : function(id){
 67     var field=this.fields.get(id);
 68     if(!field){
 69       return(null);
 70     }
 71     return(field);
 72   },
 73   
 74   /** It creates a field given a field config
 75     * @private
 76     * @param {field config} fieldCfg. See the constructor for more details
 77     * @return {Ext.ux.netbox.core.Field} the field built using
 78     */
 79   createFieldFromCfg: function(fieldCfg){
 80     var field;
 81     if(fieldCfg.type===undefined){
 82       fieldCfg.type="string";
 83     }
 84 
 85     switch(fieldCfg.type){
 86       case "string":
 87         field=new Ext.ux.netbox.string.StringField(fieldCfg.id,fieldCfg.label);
 88         break;
 89       case "enum":
 90         field=new Ext.ux.netbox.string.EnumField(fieldCfg.id,fieldCfg.label);
 91         break;
 92       case "float":
 93       case "int":
 94         field=new Ext.ux.netbox.number.NumberField(fieldCfg.id,fieldCfg.label);
 95         break;
 96       case "date":
 97         field=new Ext.ux.netbox.date.DateField(fieldCfg.id,fieldCfg.label,fieldCfg.format);
 98         break;
 99       default:
100         return(null);
101     }
102     if(fieldCfg.availableValues!==undefined){
103       field.setAvailableValues(fieldCfg.availableValues);
104       if(fieldCfg.remoteStore!==undefined){
105         field.setStoreRemote(fieldCfg.remoteStore);
106       }
107       if(fieldCfg.type=="string" || fieldCfg.type=="enum"){
108         field.addOperator(new Ext.ux.netbox.string.StringListOperator('STRING_LIST',field.stringListText));
109         field.addOperator(new Ext.ux.netbox.string.StringListOperator('STRING_NOT_IN_LIST',field.stringNotListText));
110       }
111     }
112     if(fieldCfg.defaultValues!==undefined)
113       field.setDefaultValues(fieldCfg.defaultValues);
114     if(fieldCfg.forceReload!==undefined)
115       field.setForceReload(fieldCfg.forceReload);
116     if(fieldCfg.caseSensitive!==undefined)
117       field.setCaseSensitive(fieldCfg.caseSensitive);
118     if(fieldCfg.validate!==undefined)
119       field.setValidateFn(fieldCfg.validate);
120     return(field);
121   },
122   /** This method add a Field to the array in FieldManager.
123     * If this succeeds the event "fieldAdded" is triggered.
124     * @param {Ext.ux.netbox.core.Field or field config} field The Field to add
125     */
126   addField : function(field){
127     if(!(field instanceof Ext.ux.netbox.core.Field)){
128       field=this.createFieldFromCfg(field);
129     }
130     this.fields.add(field);
131     this.fireEvent("fieldAdded",field);
132   },
133   /** This method remove a Field from the array in FieldManager.
134     * If this succeeds the event "fieldRemoved" is triggered. A removal can be vetoed returning false to the beforeFieldRemoved event
135     * For example if an elementary filter exists for the given field, the FilterModel doesn't allow the removal.
136     * @param {Ext.ux.netbox.core.Field} field The Field to remove
137     */
138   removeField : function(field){
139     if(this.fields.containsKey(field.getId())){
140       if(this.fireEvent("beforeFieldRemoved",field)!==false){
141         if(this.fields.removeKey(field.getId()))
142         this.fireEvent("fieldRemoved",field);
143       }
144     }
145   },
146   /** It removes all the fiels from this FieldManager
147     */
148   removeAll : function(){
149     for (var i=this.fields.items.length-1; i >= 0; i--) {
150       this.removeField(this.fields.items[i]);
151     }
152   },
153   /** It removes all the fields from the field manager
154     * and it readds the fields in the given config
155     * @param {Array of field config} config An array of configuration object for the fields in this object. Optional, if not present an empty FieldManager is created. See the constructort description for more details
156     */
157   reconfigure: function(config){
158     this.removeAll();
159     if(config!==undefined){
160       for(var i=0; i< config.length; i++){
161         this.addField(config[i]);
162       }
163     }
164   }
165 
166 });
